H0.text: Deuterium is a hydrogen atom with one neutron.

H1.text: Covalent is a hydrogen atom that has one neutron.

H2.text: Magnesium is a hydrogen atom with one neutron.

H3.text: Ionic is a hydrogen atom with one neutron.

A4.text: The deuterium nucleus contains one proton and one neutron.

A5.text: Deuterium (hydrogen-2, symbol 2H or D, also known as heavy hydrogen) is one of two stable isotopes of hydrogen.
